DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct Europe . The aim study estimate relationship pharmacodynamic interstitial pharmacokinetic steady state follow intravenous ( i.v . ) administration insulin detemir human soluble insulin .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Relationship Between Pharmacodynamic Interstitial Concentration Insulin Detemir Human Insulin
DOC.criteria: Healthy male 19 50 year inclusive The subject must give sign informed consent trial related activity . ( Trial relate activity procedure would perform normal management subject ) Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 27 kg/m^2 Fasting blood glucose maximum 6 mmol/l Participation clinical trial involve investigational product within last 3 month
